title: Exponential kernel function — exponential_kernel
text: x scalar representing first input point x_prime scalar vector representing second input point(s) sigma length scale parameter, controlling rate decay

what: Modified periodic kernel with long-term decay — periodic_kernel
title: Modified periodic kernel with long-term decay — periodic_kernel
Modified periodic kernel with long-term decay — periodic_kernel
Modified periodic kernel with long-term decay — periodic_kernel
text: t scalar representing time point(s) first input t_prime scalar vector representing time point(s) second input periodic_scale length scale parameter periodic kernel (time units) long_term_scale length scale parameter long term kernel (time units) period period data, representing time interval periodic behavior repeats (time units)

title: RBF kernel function — rbf_kernel
text: x scalar representing first input point x_prime scalar vector representing second input point(s) sigma length scale parameter, controlling smoothness kernel
